metadata.title: CVE-2023-5215 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libnbd. A server can reply with a block size largerthan 2^63 (the NBD spec states the size is a 64-bit unsigned value). Thisissue could lead to an application crash or other unintended behavior forNBD clients that doesn't treat the return value of the nbd_get_size()function correctly.

criterions.comment: libnbd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
